description: Its president Peter Ferbrache described the new members as a "balanced team of different skills".
title: Guernsey States: Soulsby and Helyar join senior committee
title_page: Guernsey States: Soulsby and Helyar join senior committee - BBC News
maintext: It was a message echoed by Mr Mahoney - the managing director of a trust company, owner of a small business and director of the Guernsey Rugby Academy - who said they "need to be united" and he would provide "an internal check and balance... an impartial and independent face".
